Title(s): ‘Ane deuoit orisoun To oure Lady the Virgin Mary Callit Aue Gloriosa’
Subjects: prayers, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, prayers to
_description: ‘Ane deuoit orisoun To oure Lady the Virgin Mary Callit Aue Gloriosa’ — ninety-three lines in irregular stanzas

BLAru285.First Lines: HAIll Glaid and gloriusHaill virgin hevinnis queyne…
BLAru285.Last Lines: …The bliss of hevin ws braceOff þis warld quhen we wend
BLAru285.Attributed Title: Ane deuoit orisoun To oure Lady The Virgin mary Callit Aue Gloriosa (rubric, bottom f. 193)
